name: Neonode
overview: Neonode Inc. provides optical touch screen solutions for handheld consumer and industrial electronic devices in Sweden and internationally. It develops touch screen technologies that enrich the userâ€™s experience in interacting with mobile computing, communications, and entertainment devices. The companyâ€™s touch screen solutions are based on zForce, an optical infrared touch screen technology that supports one-handed navigation allowing the user to operate the functionality with finger gestures passing over the screen; and Neno, a software-based user interface. Its touch screen solutions include sensor design, module layout, and software features for which it provides design support and device testing. The company licenses its touch screen technology to original equipment manufacturers and original design manufacturers who imbed it into electronic devices, such as mobile phones, e-book readers, mobile Internet devices, global positioning systems, digital picture frames, and micro personal computers. Neonode Inc. is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
